title: Day Appears at Last, . . . and in the Very Disk of the Sun Shines the Face of Jesus Christ (Le Jour enfin paraît, . . . et dans le disque même du soleil, rayonne la face de Jésus-Christ) (plate XXII) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
